DataElement.preferredName: Hot Flash Related Daily Interference Past Week Overall Quality of Life Score Likert Scale Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much in the past week hot flashes have interfered with their overall quality of life, using a Likert scale value captured as a non-enumerated text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hot Flash Related Daily Interference Past Week Overall Quality of Life Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tool designed to measure the impact of hot flashes on overall quality of life as well as nine specific activities using a 10 point Likert scale._The most recent week, including today._Including everything._The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Hot Flash Related Daily Interference Scale
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tool designed to measure the impact of hot flashes on overall quality of life as well as nine specific activities using a 10 point Likert scale.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
